title: Sun Bear Fun Facts
author: OrangeConcrete
pages:
Sun bear fun facts!

-------------------

1. The sun bear is the
smallest bear species
in the world, and
adults only weigh
around 35-40 kg, but
can weigh more and
less.

2. They are currently
listed as a ------->

vulnerable species.
This is due to
deforestation, illegal
hunting, pet trade, etc.

3. Sun bears have
very long tounges,
which can extend up
to 25 cm in length.
